sentences.english: It is a useful method to utilize phages in selective isolation of rare actinomyces.
sentences.chinese: 利用噬菌体是一种有效分离稀有放线菌的方法。

sentences.english: These bacteria soon burst open, spilling out enzymes and new phages.
sentences.chinese: 这些细菌很快就被胀爆，释放酶和新的噬菌体。

sentences.english: It was possible to produce phage antibody steadily in long time.
sentences.chinese: 它能在较长时间内稳定生产噬菌体抗体。

sentences.english: The bacteriophage technique was tested to enumerate the bacterial multiplication in leaf tissues of rice.
sentences.chinese: 应用噬菌体法估测了水稻叶片中白叶枯病的增殖。

sentences.english: Conclusion Phage surface display technology is a useful method to produce human monoclonal antibody against CEA.
sentences.chinese: 结论噬菌体抗体库技术是研制人源性单抗的有效途径。

sentences.english: Yersinia pestis phage lysis test was an important method on differentiation between Yersinia pestis and Yersinia pseudotuberculosis.
sentences.chinese: 鼠疫噬菌体是鉴别鼠疫菌和假结核菌的重要方法之一。

sentences.english: Objective To construct a phage display library of human single-chain Fv antibodies against blood group A substance.
sentences.chinese: 目的构建人源抗红细胞A抗原单链噬菌体抗体库。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for the measurement of relative affinity of phage antibodies.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立一种测定噬菌体抗体相对亲和力的方法。

sentences.english: New phages can develop by acquiring restriction enzymes from plasmids.
sentences.chinese: 通过从质粒获得的限制性酶，新的噬菌体能够生长。

sentences.english: M13 bacteriophage has been extensively applied in phage surface display technique.
sentences.chinese: M13噬菌体已被广泛地应用于噬菌体展示技术。

sentences.english: M13 bacteriophage has been extensively applied in phage surface display technique.
sentences.chinese: M13噬菌体已被广泛地应用于噬菌体展示技术。

sentences.english: Bacteriophages are viruses that attack and eat bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 噬菌体是一种攻击并吞食细菌的病毒。

sentences.english: Three pullulanase positive recombinant phages were obtained from this library using the amylopectin and pullulan plate.
sentences.chinese: 酶切分析证明这三个重组噬菌体含有相同的酶切片段。

sentences.english: Objective Screening Streptomyces erthreus antiphage strain.
sentences.chinese: 目的筛选红霉素链霉菌抗噬菌体菌株。

sentences.english: Phage induction following conjugation of a lysogenic bacterium with a nonlysogenic one.
sentences.chinese: 伴随着溶源菌与非溶源菌接合的噬菌体诱导。

sentences.english: Bacteriophage has been used to treat bacterial infections since it was discovered.
sentences.chinese: 噬菌体自发现之初就被人们应用于治疗各种细菌感染。
